protocol.name: P-G9799-1
protocol.text: Genomic DNA (1ug) was labeled by 500 ng using the BioPrime DNA Labeling System (Invitrogen, Paisley, UK) according to Hammond et al. (2005). The Total labeled DNA from 1ug purified Nucleotide Removal kit (QIAGEN Ltd).

protocol.name: P-G9799-2
protocol.text: Total genomic DNA was extracted from 100mg of C. kokaiensis leaf tissue no chilling treatment using a DNeasy Plant mini kit (QIAGEN Ltd, Crawley, UK).

protocol.name: P-G9799-4
protocol.text: A primordium of a first inflorescence with primordia of the first to eighth flowers was collected from each plant when the first flower primordium was visible. We collected 160 inflorescence primordia and placed them in the same microtube. The total RNA of sample was extracted using Isogen (Nippon Gene, Japan). The quality and quantity of total RNA were checked using an RNA Nano Labchip and 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies, USA).
